data.title: 25 Best Black True Crime Podcasts You Must Follow in 2024
data.meta_description: List of Best Black True Crime Podcasts. Keep up with the latest stories of black murder, crime stories, cold criminal cases much more.
data.text:
1. Sistas Who Kill

Join best friends MaRah and Taz as they research and tell stories of Black women who kill. They discuss the crimes, the outcomes, and how Black women are treated differently in the justice system than their white counterparts.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.8 / 5Facebook Followers 5.4KTwitter Followers 5.6KInstagram Followers 42.1K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 63 min Listen on Apple Spotify Play Get Influential Podcasters ContactsGet access to 100k active Podcasters, Influencers in 1500 niche categories.Get targeted media contact list in your niche at your fingertips so you can focus on running your campaign.Email us the categories of Podcasters you want to reach out for your marketing campaign at anuj@feedspot.com Copy email. We'll share active Podcasters list with verified email contacts in an Excel or CSV format.Email us

2. I Ain't a Killa Podcast

Three Black b*tches who love True Crime come together to give you a fresh perspective on some unusual cases. The hosts, Carter (they/them), Kierra-Elewa (all pronouns), & Erin (she/her), discuss what's Current in Crime and take a deep dive into a new case each week. Join our gender expansive, mostly queer, & all Black hosts as we laugh to keep from crying while delving deep into the creepy, weird, and wild!

Podcast iaintakillapodcast.buzzsprout.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.9 / 5Facebook Followers 317Twitter Followers 202Instagram Followers 791 Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 67 min Listen on Apple Play

3. Love and Murder

Ky here and I want to take you on a journey through true crime cases that explore the dark reality of some doomed relationships; unraveling the disturbing reasons that unhinged people to kill.Every week, I'll tell you true crime stories of different types of relationships that turned to murder. Join me on Love and Murder for a new episode every Sunday.

Podcast murderandlove.com

Host Ky Toure

Email

Apple Rating 4.4 / 5Facebook Followers 211Twitter Followers 859Instagram Followers 829 Frequency 1 episode / day Avg Length 23 min Listen on Apple Spotify YouTube Play

4. Not My Brothaz Keeper

What's good world this is King Arthur and this is Not My Brothaz Keeper Podcast a true crime podcast about black dudes who kill!!!

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.3 / 5 Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 49 min Listen on Apple Play

5. Hands Off My Podcast

Hands Off My Podcast: True Crime, is a professional, ethical true-crime podcast that focuses on bringing awareness to the forefront for marginalized communities such as MMIWG2SR, LGBTQ , and AANHPI individuals. We share stories of lost loved ones and highlight organizations that are dedicated to making a difference. If you appreciate our podcast and would like to show your support, we would greatly appreciate a 5-star rating on Spotify, a rating and review on Apple Podcasts, or even finding us on the Audible app. Additionally, you can listen and rate us on the Goodpods listening app too! Thank you for your support.

Podcast handsoffmypodcast.transistor.fm

Email

Apple Rating 4.6 / 5Facebook Followers 322Twitter Followers 2K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 44 min Listen on Apple Spotify YouTube Play

6. It's the Mystery for Me

Welcome to 'It's the Mystery for Me' a true-crime podcast focused on the murders, mysterious deaths, and disappearances of black females. What makes #ITMFM different from other true crime podcasts? Well, your hosts are sisters of Black & Afrolatina descent. And the cherry on top? Priscilla is a lawyer and Norma is in her last year of law school so they are giving you all kinds of perspectives chile. During every episode, they sprinkle in a few of their personalities to try to take the edge off, but the spookiness remains.

Podcast itsthemysteryforme.buzzsprout.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.6 / 5Twitter Followers 184Instagram Followers 3.6K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 52 min Listen on Apple Spotify Play

7. Black Girl Gone

True crime with a new focus...shining a light on the all too often ignored cases of Black women who have gone missing or have fallen victim to murder.Each episode takes you on a heart wrenching journey through the stories of these women and the families they left behind. Join us as we work to uncover hidden truths and bring the stories of these women to the forefront.Together we can seek justice for the forgotten and give a voice to the voiceless.New episodes every Monday.

Podcast blackgirlgonepodcast.com

Host Amara C.

Email

Apple Rating 4.8 / 5Facebook Followers 7.9KTwitter Followers 1.6KInstagram Followers 79.1K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 34 min Listen on Apple Spotify Video Podcast YouTube Play

8. Black Girl True Crime

I am Kay Simone, your host of Black Girl True Crime and my mission is to knock you off your ass once a week. Let's be real, true crime is fascinating. Why do people do the things they do? If you have a morbid curiosity, tune in. If you are looking for a safe space to dive into this dark world we live in, tune in.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.7 / 5 Frequency 2 episodes / month Avg Length 49 min Listen on Apple Play

9. Bitch I Can't

True crime stories told by a vulgar gay black man.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 4.7 / 5 Frequency 12 episodes / quarter Avg Length 27 min Listen on Apple Play

10. Black True Crime Podcast

This is a podcast where two sisters research and comment on murders committed by black offenders, some of which, barely get any public attention. Because of this, they can accumulate significant amounts of victims & operate for long periods without being caught. We will also be discussing missing African American victims, unsolved cases, as well as solved disappearances.

Podcast blacktruecrime.com

Email

Facebook Followers 1.3KTwitter Followers 845Instagram Followers 22K Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 53 min Video Podcast YouTube Play

11. Killer Talk with Big Neir

A black true crime podcast where we have killer discussions about cases both solved and unsolved.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Frequency 1 episode / month Avg Length 42 min Play

12. Kocktails and Krime

Black true crime and cocktails.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Frequency 2 episodes / month Avg Length 33 min Play

13. Murder In The Black

Looking for a true-crime podcast? MD and Steph are two sisters who love to share weekly True Crime stories that happen in the black community! Covering stories that are often overlooked by mainstream media!

Podcast murderintheblack.com

Email

Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 46 min Play

14. In Killing Color

You are now in the place for true crime. True BLACK crime. We will bring light to the unheard and pushed-down stories of black crime. True crime is horrible but luckily I'm not.

Podcast play.disctopia.com

Email

Twitter Followers 266 Frequency 12 episodes / quarter Avg Length 29 min Play

15. Evil Lives Amongst Us

Lend me your ears as I tell you tales of crimes committed by African-American folk. These stories are not for the squeamish but for those who truly are interested in hearing about crimes committed by black people. These women and men of color will surprise you with the heinous crimes that they committed.

Podcast buzzsprout.com

Host Queen Zoaya Counts

Email

Frequency 4 episodes / month Avg Length 12 min Play

16. No Tears For Black Girls

Delve into the forgotten stories of black women in true crime and missing persons cases that are often hidden by the media's blind eye. Don't miss a single episodeâ€”subscribe now to stay informed! New episodes drop every Monday and Thursday.Created, Written, & Produced by John Reedburg.Hosted by Samantha Paul.Production Company: John Reedburg Media.

Podcast notearsforblackgirls.com

Email

Facebook Followers 36Twitter Followers 59Instagram Followers 88 Frequency 1 episode / week Avg Length 19 min Listen on YouTube Play

17. True Crime Remixed

Vengeance, scams, murder, and strange disappearances from the black perspective... Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/truecrimeremixed/support

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 5 / 5Facebook Followers 107Twitter Followers 2 Frequency 2 episodes / year Avg Length 34 min Listen on Apple Play

18. The Missing Found Podcast

The Missing Found is a true crime podcast that focuses on missing person cases in the Black Community, that have gone cold or with little to no coverage.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 5 / 5Instagram Followers 46 Frequency 11 episodes / year Avg Length 31 min Listen on Apple YouTube Play

19. Crime Time With A Fine Dime

Crime Time With a Fine Dime is a true crime podcast hosted by ya favorite sophistiratchet dime CharlyeJay! I discuss crimes involving black victims and criminals. Sit down with me and let's have a conversation friend about the crazy crimes in this wild world.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Apple Rating 5 / 5Instagram Followers 147 Frequency 1 episode / year Avg Length 28 min Listen on Apple Play

20. Missing Black Voices

A true-crime podcast that highlights the stories of missing and murdered black men, women, and children.

Podcast spreaker.com

Email

Facebook Followers 80Twitter Followers 103Instagram Followers 657 Play

21. Truly Being Black

Truly Being Black is a true crime podcast. This podcast will highlight the lost but not forgotten Men of the black community who vanished into thin air. Here at the Truly Being Black podcast, we discuss cases of men who have been exploited and wrongfully accused.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Play

22. True Crime Black

The True Crime genre doesn't always include equity in its storytelling. Every day, there are black victims of heinous murders, stalking, assault, robberies, and many more. Those cases are not presented with the same context and background that the cases of others have the benefit of receiving.

Podcast podcasters.spotify.com

Email

Instagram Followers 26.1K Listen on Apple

Show 23 to 100
